name: It belongs in a museum!
description:
In this puzzle game, you explore a lost temple to retrieve historical artifacts. You must control a stream of light in order to progress, and you only have a limited amount of time to catch as much treasure as you can once you find the solution.

How to play:

Controller:  A to interact, X to sprint, left stick to move

Keyboard:  E to interact, Shift to sprint, ZQSD/WASD to move

Jam version:

The game was made for the Time jam hosted by Retro Indie Josh and 8 Bits to Infinity. The theme was Stream and the game needed to include a time limit. The stream of light is the central element of the puzzle part, and the time limit is the main challenge of the treasure hunting part.

Credits:

AI-generated music from Evoke Music

Sound effects from freesound.org

Art by Lilikoiboy

Font Too much ink by Ashurcollective
